properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y';

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_TITLE , NICKNAME , BOARD_COUNT , TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') "BOARD_DATE" FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = MEM_ID) WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
